sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Box, Button } from 'react-bulma-components'; function Search() { const { Input, Field, Control, Label, FieldLabel, FieldBody, Select } = Form const [inputs, setInputs] = useState([]) const trackChanges = (event) => { const name = event.target.name const value = event.target.value setInputs({ [name]: value }) } return (
{inputs} {/* Genres field */} {/* Depth field */} {/* Sort field */} {/* Type field */} {/* Submit field */}
) } export default Search
